meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: The Supreme Court unanimously upheld a ruling that Georgia's system for electing state judges is subject to Justice Department review to assure it is not discriminatory. Page A24.
Racial discrimination in parks, pools and other public places officially became illegal in South Africa.
The Supreme Court unanimously upheld a ruling that Georgia's system for electing state judges is subject to Justice Department review to assure it is not discriminatory. Page A24.
Racial discrimination in parks, pools and other public places officially became illegal in South Africa.
The Supreme Court unanimously upheld a ruling that Georgia's system for electing state judges is subject to Justice Department review to assure it is not discriminatory. Page A24.
Racial discrimination in parks, pools and other public places officially became illegal in South Africa. But the new integration does not apply to private establishments. Page A3.
By ordering up to $22 billion worth of long-range wide-body aircraft from Boeing, United Airlines signaled that it was putting the long union buyout effort behind it. Page D1.
In his final illness, Leonard Bernstein remained alert, looking forward to composing and even conducting.
Recollections and tributes by associates, pages C13 and C16.
Paul O'Neill of the Reds has been prepared for the World Series by a family that treated baseball like a religion, his sister says. Page D25.
